title: Wilde Agency Wins Two at Gramercy Institute Financial Marketing Strategy Awards
text:
Wilde Agency Wins Two at Gramercy Institute Financial Marketing Strategy Awards
Wilde Agencys work for Nationwide was recognized with two awards at the Gramercy Institute Financial Marketing Strategy Awards event in New York City.
Westwood, MA, July 08, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Agency President John Sisson and VP Account Director Lianne Wade were among the senior agency executives, financial marketers and media leaders who gathered at Le Cirque recently to celebrate this year’s winners of the 13th annual Gramercy Institute Financial Marketing Strategy Awards in New York City.
Wilde Agency’s work for Nationwide was recognized with two awards; one in the Life & Annuity Insurance category for Nationwide’s “Long Term Care” campaign, and another in the Retirement category for Nationwide’s “Accelerated Retention” campaign.
“Our expertise leveraging the science of human behavior to drive action for our clients begins at the strategic level,” said John Sisson . “It’s extremely rewarding to be recognized with two awards that celebrate strategic excellence.” Lianne Wade , the account lead for Nationwide, added that “the firms receiving awards from the Gramercy Institute represent the best of the best in financial services, so I’m thrilled to be accepting these awards on behalf of Nationwide.”
Based in New York, the Gramercy Institute is a leading global think tank for senior marketers from the world’s leading financial institutions. Its member firms include 33 of the world’s leading financial institutions, and its network spans a financial marketing community of over 5,000 industry professionals, worldwide. GI hosts an annual calendar of over 23 conferences, summits, forums and award shows each year in leading financial hubs worldwide.
About Wilde Agency:
Wilde Agency is an award-winning digital and direct marketing agency with a deep expertise in leveraging behavioral science – the science of how people make decisions – to drive revenue. The full-service agency offers strategy, customer insight, data/analytics, creative and production across all channels.
